statements: SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE portfolio_id = 123;
SELECT date, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT portfolio_id, return_rate FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE return_rate > 8.0;
SELECT date, investment_amount, investment_type FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT date, return_rate, investment_type FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT date, investment_amount, return_rate FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE return_rate >= 10.5;
SELECT investment_type, AVG(return_rate) AS average_return FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data GROUP BY investment_type;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio_performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio ORDER BY investor_name DESC
SELECT portfolio_id, return_rate, performance_date FROM Performance_Data WHERE risk_level='Low'
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 10000 AND investment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT portfolio_id, investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio INNER JOIN Performance_Data ON Investment_Portfolio.portfolio_id = Performance_Data.portfolio_id
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investor_name = 'Alice';
SELECT portfolio_id, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.investment_amount, pd.return_rate FROM Investment_Portfolio p JOIN Performance_Data pd ON p.portfolio_id = pd.portfolio_id WHERE pd.risk_level = 'Moderate' AND p.investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Performance_Data WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, investment_date FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM PortfolioHoldings JOIN InvestmentData ON PortfolioHoldings.investment_id = InvestmentData.investment_id ORDER BY holding_date ASC;

SELECT investment_name, risk_level, performance_date FROM InvestmentData JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON InvestmentData.investment_id = PerformanceMetrics.investment_id WHERE return_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentData ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, investment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, investment_amount FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_type='Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, investment_name ASC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name, investment_type, investment_amount, investment_date FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_amount ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.holding_id, p.holding_date, p.holding_quantity, p.holding_value, i.investment_name FROM PortfolioHoldings p INNER JOIN InvestmentData i ON p.investment_id = i.investment_id ORDER BY p.holding_value DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT i.investment_name, p.holding_quantity, m.return_rate, m.risk_level FROM InvestmentData i INNER JOIN PortfolioHoldings p ON i.investment_id = p.investment_id INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics m ON i.investment_id = m.investment_id WHERE p.holding_quantity > 100 ORDER BY m.return_rate DESC, m.risk_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 10000
SELECT investor_id, asset_name, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) as total_assets FROM investment_portfolio GROUP BY asset_type
SELECT investor_name, country FROM investor_info WHERE country='USA'
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, start_date, end_date FROM portfolio_trends
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT asset_name, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investor_name, country FROM investor_info WHERE investor_type = 'Individual' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE return_rate > 8 AND risk_score < 5 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM portfolio_trends WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portsfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Investment_Portsfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity FROM Portfolio_Holdings WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM Stock_Performance WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT trend_category, trend_value, date FROM Trend_Analysis ORDER BY date DESC, trend_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE total_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_value DESC
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Holdings WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM Stock_Performance WHERE date = '2022-06-30' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Trend_Analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
